text: 9.26 1 Ko 10.11, Gal 4.4, Hib 7.27, 9.12, 1 Pi 3.18 Adek anɨb ak tek gɨpɨkop ak, bɨlel man alwol gɨlak ñɨn ak tɨkɨl, mɨd dad apɨl mɨdobun ñɨn awl, pel sub okok sub okok yul dɨl kubɨkop. Pen ñɨn tapɨn padɨkup ñɨn awl, binɨb okok tap si tap tɨmel gach ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨg apjakɨl, mɨnek nokom yɨbɨl mubwak ne ke ak dɨl, God nop sɨbog ñak.
